name: Candy Rushed
description:
Fill your screen with sparkling sugar cubes, and watch out for ants! Explode the candy cubes by matching 3, 4 or 5 of the same color. Help chef Monsieur Lemercier get sugar for his spectacular desserts, he’s counting on you to help. Watch out for ants, make sure you have bug spray to get rid of them.....

Candy Rush is a match game that is easy to learn but difficult to master. It is a nonstop blitz.

Your goal is to explode these cubes by matching 3, 4 or 5 of the same color.

TRY 3 MODES OF GAMEPLAY

Levels – Test your skills and become the best.

Timed – Match as many as you can.

Endless – Swipe, dash, and crush to your heart’s content and earn tons of points.

EARN COOL POWER UPS

Clues – Find elusive matches and solve the puzzle.
